info.author: Koji Kishimoto
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
info.description:
PAIDA is pure Python scientific analysis package.
The main features are:

 - Pure Python! (so works on both Python and Jython)
 - AIDA (Abstract Interfaces for Data Analysis) support
 - Creating/Plotting the histogram, ntuple, profile and cloud
 - Function fitting (parameter optimization) with constraints and its parabolic and asymmetric errors 
evaluation
 - XML based storing
 - Matrix calculation

PAIDA web site:
http://paida.sourceforge.net/

AIDA project has other implementations like Java (JAIDA), C++ etc. (Open Scientist and Anaphe).
For more information about AIDA itself, please refer to
http://aida.freehep.org/
info.name: paida
info.summary: A pure Python package for the scientific data analysis and plotting
info.html_description:
PAIDA is pure Python scientific analysis package.
The main features are:

- Pure Python! (so works on both Python and Jython)
- AIDA (Abstract Interfaces for Data Analysis) support
- Creating/Plotting the histogram, ntuple, profile and cloud
- Function fitting (parameter optimization) with constraints and its parabolic and asymmetric errors
evaluation
- XML based storing
- Matrix calculation

PAIDA web site:
http://paida.sourceforge.net/

AIDA project has other implementations like Java (JAIDA), C++ etc. (Open Scientist and Anaphe).
For more information about AIDA itself, please refer to
